issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://twitter.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2F) ### Comment Username: @felixonmars > Enabling AdGuard Adblocker completely breaks Twitter's login here. It either shows a blank popup or "An error occurred" and doesn't complete login process. With other extensions unchanged and only AdGuard Adblocker disabled for the website, the login functionality works correctly. 100% reproducible after double-checking for some time. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
> @@||api.twitter.com/1.1/jot/client_event.json$domain=twitter.com

I have tried to unblock this among some others in the "Filtering log" window. Still no luck so far, and since it's easy to trigger a rate limit when the problem is present, I'll need some additional time to investigate.

comment.body:
It looks like that any user can set "whatever" he/she wants in user signature.
I see that some users have just images, some have links to another thread (in the same forum), another users have gifs with link to another thread (in the same forum) and some have gifs with links to third party websites.
So, I'm really not sure if it should be blocked.

issue.title: datadoghq.eu does not load as it was added to Adguard DNS Filter
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard Browser Extension, AdGuard for Mac ### AdGuard version 2.9.1.1217 release ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? Chrome ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? datadoghq.eu ### What filters do you have enabled? AdGuard Base filter ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots ## Summary `datadoghq.eu` was added to the list of filters recently breaking the ability to view their dashboard for collecting traces for the app which is accessible via `app.datadoghq.eu`. **NOTE** this only concerns `.eu` TLD as `datadoghq.com` is perfectly accessible, you can see only `.eu` being added in the list https://filters.adtidy.org/mac_v2/filters/15.txt Disabling DNS protection feature in the Adguard makes the website accessible again. ## Screenshots
datadoghq.eu working with DNS protection disabled
datadoghq.eu not working with DNS protection enabled
### Privacy - [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Switching DNS from Adguard DNS to Cloudflare DNS also resolves the issue and loads the website correctly.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
I have doubts about that every link to third party website added to user signature is an ad (even if it's a image).

This rule:
```adblock
r10.net##.userSignature a img
```
should block all images with links in user signatures, but it's for user filters only.

issue.title: Kylie.com - Various breakage (AdGuard Annoyances filter) [GDPR]
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.46.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.kylie.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected site:
`https://www.kylie.com/`

(Click "**CONTINUE TO SITE**")

### Issue:
Various breakage, due to a blocked cookie consent, which needs to be accepted.
E.g. the images for more YouTube videos (below the big embedded one) are missing, and the Merch items are out of position!

### Screenshot:
Not needed, as the problem is obvious.

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Annoyances filter**

### Problem rules:
`||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com^$third-party`
`||privacy-mgmt.com/mms^`

### Possible fixes:
Simply:
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com^$domain=kylie.com`

..or more specifically:
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com^*/wrapperMessagingWithoutDetection.js$domain=kylie.com`
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com/mms/*/get_site_data?$domain=kylie.com`
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com/privacy-manager/$domain=kylie.com`
In this case, the last rule is needed in order to be able to customize your consents ("**SHOW PRIVACY MANAGER**").

### Other problem filters:
* **I don't care about cookies** (@kiboke)
 
`/wrapperMessagingWithoutDetection.js$domain=~standard.co.uk|~ladbible.com|~theguardian.com|~theguardian.com.|~bild.de|~autoweek.nl|~computerbild.de|~bold.dk|~welt.de|~t-online.de|~sport1.de|~focus.de|~chip.de|~faz.net|~n-tv.de|~wunderweib.de|~helpster.de|~tvmovie.de|~praxisvita.de|~cosmopolitan.de|~giga.de|~ostsee-zeitung.de|~sky.com|~lvz.de|~mein-schoener-garten.de|~boerse-online.de|~tvspielfilm.de|~autobild.de|~aftonbladet.se|~bike-bild.de|~bz-berlin.de|~travelbook.de|~cyberport.at|~cyberport.de|~golem.de|~express.de|~ksta.de|~utopia.de|~sky.it|~tv8.it|~cielotv.it|~bndestem.nl|~volkskrant.nl|~rundschau-online.de|~rtl2.de|~capital.fr|~derstandard.de|~derstandard.at|~unsere-helden.com|~rtl.de|~stern.de|~myaccount.hln.be|~nu.nl|~maennersache.de|~dpgmedia.nl|~destentor.nl|~zeit.de|~ad.nl|~dpgmedia.be|~heise.de|~t3n.de|~11freunde.de|~finanzen.at|~finanzen.net|~insider.com|~transfermarkt.at|~transfermarkt.ch|~transfermarkt.co.uk|~transfermarkt.com|~transfermarkt.com.tr|~transfermarkt.de|~transfermarkt.fr|~transfermarkt.it|~transfermarkt.nl|~transfermarkt.pl|~transfermarkt.pt|~transfermarkt.us|~vip.de|~businessinsider.de|~clever-tanken.de|~fitbook.de|~idealo.at|~idealo.co.uk|~idealo.de|~idealo.es|~idealo.fr|~idealo.it|~meinestadt.de|~metal-hammer.de|~musikexpress.de|~myhomebook.de|~noizz.de|~politico.eu|~rollingstone.de|~stylebook.de|~techbook.de|~testbild.de|~wieistmeineip.at|~wieistmeineip.de|~wieistmeineip.ch`

`privacy-mgmt.com$domain=~standard.co.uk|~theguardian.com|~theguardian.com.|~bild.de|~computerbild.de|~bold.dk|~welt.de|~t-online.de|~focus.de|~chip.de|~faz.net|~n-tv.de|~spiegel.de|~privacy-mgmt.com|~wunderweib.de|~helpster.de|~tvmovie.de|~praxisvita.de|~cosmopolitan.de|~giga.de|~ostsee-zeitung.de|~sky.com|~lvz.de|~mein-schoener-garten.de|~boerse-online.de|~tvspielfilm.de|~autobild.de|~bike-bild.de|~bz-berlin.de|~cyberport.at|~cyberport.de|~golem.de|~express.de|~sky.it|~tv8.it|~cielotv.it|~epaper.volksstimme.de|~volkskrant.nl|~rtl2.de|~si.com|~derstandard.de|~derstandard.at|~unsere-helden.com|~rtl.de|~stern.de|~freenet-funk.de|~maennersache.de|~heise.de|~t3n.de|~11freunde.de|~finanzen.at|~finanzen.net|~insider.com|~transfermarkt.at|~transfermarkt.ch|~transfermarkt.co.uk|~transfermarkt.com|~transfermarkt.com.tr|~transfermarkt.de|~transfermarkt.fr|~transfermarkt.it|~transfermarkt.nl|~transfermarkt.pl|~transfermarkt.pt|~transfermarkt.us|~vip.de|~businessinsider.de|~clever-tanken.de|~fitbook.de|~meinestadt.de|~metal-hammer.de|~musikexpress.de|~myhomebook.de|~noizz.de|~politico.eu|~rollingstone.de|~stylebook.de|~techbook.de|~testbild.de|~wieistmeineip.at|~wieistmeineip.de|~wieistmeineip.ch`

comment.body:
Most are new idea from 2022 based on issue by "[slavaleleka](https://github.com/slavaleleka)": https://github.com/AdguardTeam/FiltersRegistry/issues/632

> AdGuard Cookie Notices,
> AdGuard Popups,
> AdGuard Mobile App Banners,
> AdGuard Other Annoyances,
> AdGuard Widgets,

So can't now name "why is still available" - That's what you'll be able to say in a few years as modular versions will have low activation statistics.

issue.title: datadoghq.eu does not load as it was added to Adguard DNS Filter

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard Browser Extension, AdGuard for Mac ### AdGuard version 2.9.1.1217 release ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? Chrome ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? datadoghq.eu ### What filters do you have enabled? AdGuard Base filter ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots ## Summary `datadoghq.eu` was added to the list of filters recently breaking the ability to view their dashboard for collecting traces for the app which is accessible via `app.datadoghq.eu`. **NOTE** this only concerns `.eu` TLD as `datadoghq.com` is perfectly accessible, you can see only `.eu` being added in the list https://filters.adtidy.org/mac_v2/filters/15.txt Disabling DNS protection feature in the Adguard makes the website accessible again. ## Screenshots
datadoghq.eu working with DNS protection disabled
datadoghq.eu not working with DNS protection enabled

comment.body:
### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

pull_request.body:
## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [ ] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [ ] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [ ] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

Example: <https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/100000>

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

<!-- Please write a comment here -->

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [ ] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

issue.title: Kylie.com - Various breakage (AdGuard Annoyances filter) [GDPR]
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.46.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.kylie.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected site:
`https://www.kylie.com/`

(Click "**CONTINUE TO SITE**")

### Issue:
Various breakage, due to a blocked cookie consent, which needs to be accepted.
E.g. the images for more YouTube videos (below the big embedded one) are missing, and the Merch items are out of position!

### Screenshot:
Not needed, as the problem is obvious.

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Annoyances filter**

### Problem rules:
`||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com^$third-party`
`||privacy-mgmt.com/mms^`

### Possible fixes:
Simply:
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com^$domain=kylie.com`

..or more specifically:
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com^*/wrapperMessagingWithoutDetection.js$domain=kylie.com`
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com/mms/*/get_site_data?$domain=kylie.com`
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com/privacy-manager/$domain=kylie.com`
In this case, the last rule is needed in order to be able to customize your consents ("**SHOW PRIVACY MANAGER**").

### Other problem filters:
* **I don't care about cookies** (@kiboke)
 
`/wrapperMessagingWithoutDetection.js$domain=~standard.co.uk|~ladbible.com|~theguardian.com|~theguardian.com.|~bild.de|~autoweek.nl|~computerbild.de|~bold.dk|~welt.de|~t-online.de|~sport1.de|~focus.de|~chip.de|~faz.net|~n-tv.de|~wunderweib.de|~helpster.de|~tvmovie.de|~praxisvita.de|~cosmopolitan.de|~giga.de|~ostsee-zeitung.de|~sky.com|~lvz.de|~mein-schoener-garten.de|~boerse-online.de|~tvspielfilm.de|~autobild.de|~aftonbladet.se|~bike-bild.de|~bz-berlin.de|~travelbook.de|~cyberport.at|~cyberport.de|~golem.de|~express.de|~ksta.de|~utopia.de|~sky.it|~tv8.it|~cielotv.it|~bndestem.nl|~volkskrant.nl|~rundschau-online.de|~rtl2.de|~capital.fr|~derstandard.de|~derstandard.at|~unsere-helden.com|~rtl.de|~stern.de|~myaccount.hln.be|~nu.nl|~maennersache.de|~dpgmedia.nl|~destentor.nl|~zeit.de|~ad.nl|~dpgmedia.be|~heise.de|~t3n.de|~11freunde.de|~finanzen.at|~finanzen.net|~insider.com|~transfermarkt.at|~transfermarkt.ch|~transfermarkt.co.uk|~transfermarkt.com|~transfermarkt.com.tr|~transfermarkt.de|~transfermarkt.fr|~transfermarkt.it|~transfermarkt.nl|~transfermarkt.pl|~transfermarkt.pt|~transfermarkt.us|~vip.de|~businessinsider.de|~clever-tanken.de|~fitbook.de|~idealo.at|~idealo.co.uk|~idealo.de|~idealo.es|~idealo.fr|~idealo.it|~meinestadt.de|~metal-hammer.de|~musikexpress.de|~myhomebook.de|~noizz.de|~politico.eu|~rollingstone.de|~stylebook.de|~techbook.de|~testbild.de|~wieistmeineip.at|~wieistmeineip.de|~wieistmeineip.ch`

`privacy-mgmt.com$domain=~standard.co.uk|~theguardian.com|~theguardian.com.|~bild.de|~computerbild.de|~bold.dk|~welt.de|~t-online.de|~focus.de|~chip.de|~faz.net|~n-tv.de|~spiegel.de|~privacy-mgmt.com|~wunderweib.de|~helpster.de|~tvmovie.de|~praxisvita.de|~cosmopolitan.de|~giga.de|~ostsee-zeitung.de|~sky.com|~lvz.de|~mein-schoener-garten.de|~boerse-online.de|~tvspielfilm.de|~autobild.de|~bike-bild.de|~bz-berlin.de|~cyberport.at|~cyberport.de|~golem.de|~express.de|~sky.it|~tv8.it|~cielotv.it|~epaper.volksstimme.de|~volkskrant.nl|~rtl2.de|~si.com|~derstandard.de|~derstandard.at|~unsere-helden.com|~rtl.de|~stern.de|~freenet-funk.de|~maennersache.de|~heise.de|~t3n.de|~11freunde.de|~finanzen.at|~finanzen.net|~insider.com|~transfermarkt.at|~transfermarkt.ch|~transfermarkt.co.uk|~transfermarkt.com|~transfermarkt.com.tr|~transfermarkt.de|~transfermarkt.fr|~transfermarkt.it|~transfermarkt.nl|~transfermarkt.pl|~transfermarkt.pt|~transfermarkt.us|~vip.de|~businessinsider.de|~clever-tanken.de|~fitbook.de|~meinestadt.de|~metal-hammer.de|~musikexpress.de|~myhomebook.de|~noizz.de|~politico.eu|~rollingstone.de|~stylebook.de|~techbook.de|~testbild.de|~wieistmeineip.at|~wieistmeineip.de|~wieistmeineip.ch`

**Note to kiboke:**
Your rules have an error in them..
`theguardian.com` is listed twice, and there's a misplaced punctuation mark behind the redundant listing!

--

* Browser/version: LibreWolf v108.0.1-1 (x64) (Tracking Protection = Standard)

comment.body:
The element is not available with filters on or off.
How do I implement the rule?

Mike

The rules are there to make you think before you break them. — Terry Pratchet

> On Jan 5, 2023, at 1:38 PM, Alex ***@***.***> wrote:
> 
> 
> @tecumsa <https://github.com/tecumsa> Please test this rule
> facebook.com#@#div[role="main"] div[style="height: 0px;"] + div[class] > div[class] > div[class] div[class] div[class][style*="border-radius"]
> 
> I reproduced with Annoyanced filter, but that element is not visible without filters on your device, right?
> 
> —
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/137606#issuecomment-1372592504>, or unsubscribe <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AN75VHYEPLCVQ4JTAZAOSETWQ4IMBANCNFSM6AAAAAATBX3DPE>.
